-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Simple chat
--   
--   Simple example of chat application. Consists of 3 components:
--   hach-server, hach-client (simple console client), hach-nclient (vty-ui
--   client).
@package Hach
@version 0.1.1

module Hach.Types
type Nick = Text
type Timestamp = UTCTime
data CMessage
CPlain :: CMessage
CAction :: CMessage
CSetNick :: CMessage
data SMessage
SPlain :: Nick -> SMessage
SAction :: Nick -> SMessage
SSetNick :: Nick -> SMessage
SSystem :: SMessage
data C2S
C2S :: Text -> CMessage -> C2S
data S2C
S2C :: Text -> SMessage -> Timestamp -> S2C
text :: S2C -> Text
messageType :: S2C -> SMessage
time :: S2C -> Timestamp
fromS2C :: S2C -> Text
toC2S :: Text -> IO C2S
instance Read SMessage
instance Show SMessage
instance Read S2C
instance Show S2C
instance Read CMessage
instance Show CMessage
instance Read C2S
instance Show C2S
